title: gAnalOla nI lIlalenna
sahitya:
(rAgA:  gamanAshrama)   
  gAnalOla nI lIlalenna jAlarA muraLI


anupallavi

  mAnita suguNAlavAla mAnuta caraNA muraLI
			(rAg  ahIrbhairav)


caraNam 1    vankalenna mAninA vankagAnarA akaLanka vijita rAkA shashAnka mOhana muraLI
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  AbhOgi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 D2 S  Av:  S D2 M1 G2 R2 S  kEshamu-larpincu bhakta klEshamula nAsimpa jEsi Asincina phalamulannIkai sEyumurA muraLI
    caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  mAyAmALavagauLa)Aa:S R1 G3 M1 P D1 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D1 P M1 G3 R1 S  sapta girulamIda nIvu guptamugA dAginAvu triptitO smarinci nI AptuDaitirA muraLI
    caraNam 4  			(rAgA:  madhyamAvati)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 R2 S  sthAna balimi nIku nI AsthAna balimi nAku dEvasthAna 
mAye hrdE sAmagAna mosagitivi dEva dEva dEva dEva muraLI
